| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1305](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1305 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

The **squealer** is a monster added in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). They share the [xan](/wiki/Xan "Xan")'s leg-damaging attack, and the [shrieker](/wiki/Shrieker "Shrieker")'s shriek. They are poisonous to eat.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Squealer\&action=edit)*
html:
Squealer

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
q squealer
Difficulty 7
Attacks Claw 1d3, Bite 1d3, Bite 1d8, Sting 1d6 scratching, targets legs
q squealer
Difficulty 7
Attacks

Claw 1d3, Bite 1d3, Bite 1d8, Sting 1d6 scratching, targets legs

Base level 4
Base experience 44
Speed 9
Base AC 7
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 400
Nutritional value 100
Size Large
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A squealer:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
  • normally appears in small groups.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1305

The squealer is a monster added in SLASH'EM. They share the xan's leg-damaging attack, and the shrieker's shriek. They are poisonous to eat.


This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
